text: "Tú Sólo Tú" () is a song by American singer Selena. "Tú Sólo Tú" became the last single released from Dreaming of You (1995). == Covers == *Pedro Infante == Charts == Chart (1995/1996) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot Latin Tracks 1 U.S. Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay 1 == References == Category:Selena songs Category:1995 songs Category:Songs in Spanish
title: Tú Sólo Tú
